author: mirichmo
body: Some work may be required to more gracefully handle module imports when modules are incompatible with PowerShell Core.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: Seems like PSGallery should cover most common case of preventing install of incompatible modules.  Seems like an edge case for someone to xcopy an incompatible module.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT It seems we could close the issue.

title: Module Manifest Import Checks
